text: This article lists events from the year 2000 in The Bahamas. == Incumbents == * Monarch: Elizabeth II * Governor-General: Sir Orvile Turnquest * Prime Minister: Hubert Ingraham ==Events== ==Deaths== * January 6 - David Mitchell, convicted murderer ==See also== List of years in the Bahamas ==References== ==Links== Category:2000s in the Bahamas Category:Years of the 21st century in the Bahamas Bahamas Bahamas
title: 2000 in the Bahamas
